p.k: Appreciation Day / Peeps / Dizzy / My Mom By trying to change Benson's opinion of them, Mordecai and Rigby accidentally create lots of work for themselves. / Benson gets surveillance cameras to keep track of Mordecai and Rigby on the job. / Mordecai and Rigby help Pops get over his fear of public speaking. / Mordecai and Rigby are forced to work under Muscle Man and endure his repetitive jokes.
